article.headline: Charting a bullish Q4 start:  S&P 500 extends rally from major support
article.body: Broadly speaking, the major U.S. benchmarks are off to a constructive October start, reclaiming key technical levels. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 has asserted a bullish-leaning intermediate-term bias, rising to three-week highs from a successful test of major support (3,328). Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view, the S&P...
